pinyin: Wan4 guo2 You2 zheng4 Lian2 meng2

definition: to ally/to unite/to join/(poetry) antithetical couplet
oath/pledge/union/to ally/league, a subdivision corresponding to prefecture in Inner Mongolia

sentences.english: Today we are gathering here for the grand opening ceremony of the Universal Postal Congress.
sentences.chinese: 今天，萬國郵政聯盟大會將在這裏隆重開幕7。

sentences.english: She is the first female rural postal worker to take the stage at a meeting of the UPU.
sentences.chinese: 她是第一個登上萬國郵政聯盟講臺的鄉村女郵遞員。
